attributes.action: Revoke Article 50 automatically at 23.59 CET on 11 April 2019
attributes.additional_details: Given the new date for a cliff edge crash out of the EU and Parliament's continued impasse, I feel it imperative that the British people be protected from Parliamentary failure
attributes.background: If, on 11 April 2019 at 23.59 CET there is no withdrawal agreement in place signed by both the UK and EU, Article 50 must be automatically revoked
